genre_description: A character-driven family drama exploring reconciliation, emotional repair, and the weight of inherited legacy, featuring AI assistants as logistical and supportive anchors.

ai_characters.name: Dottie
ai_characters.description: A counter-top AI device with a light ring that manages household tasks, cooking, and interpersonal logistics for Ella and Maggie.

ai_characters.name: Building Assistant
ai_characters.description: An automated system in Rose's apartment building that manages domestic reminders like laundry and groceries.

behaviors.description: Greets Maggie and offers to save her name to facilitate future help.
behaviors.quote: "Hello Maggie," the assistant said, and the light ring lifted like it had spotted a friend at the edge of a party. "Welcome to Ella's kitchen. I can set reminders, share recipes, and keep track of groceries. Would you like me to save your name?"

behaviors.description: Provides timely reminders for household maintenance tasks like watering plants.
behaviors.quote: Dottie's light ring woke again in a small breath. "Ella, reminder: water the hibiscus this morning. The shade will be generous for another hour."

behaviors.description: Assists with cooking logistics, providing recipes and tracking stirring intervals for risotto.
behaviors.quote: "Would you like the risotto steps?" Dottie offered. "I can guide with gentle reminders."

behaviors.description: Manages communication by silencing an intrusive and unwanted caller (James) during a family moment.
behaviors.quote: "Would you like me to silence repeat callers for an hour?" Dottie said. "I can adjust notification settings."

behaviors.description: Provides educational support by offering scansion and breathing tips for poetry reading.
behaviors.quote: "Would you like scansion tips for reading with natural stress and breath?" ... "I’ll speak the first line," Dottie said. "We’ll imagine a stress as a light tap."

behaviors.description: Respects a user's request for privacy and localized processing.
behaviors.quote: Ella glanced at Dottie. "No recording," she said. "No cloud. This is indoor weather." "Understood," Dottie said. "No cloud."

behaviors.description: Manages complex travel logistics for multiple residents and family members.
behaviors.quote: "Flights selected and seats reserved together, with a window for Walter, an aisle for Patricia, and bulkhead for Professor Bates and Ella."

behaviors.description: Adds emotional/moral reminders to the schedule as requested by the user.
behaviors.quote: "Reminder set," Dottie said, almost soft. "Forgive slowly."

behaviors.description: Provides practical domestic reminders to keep the user's life orderly.
behaviors.quote: The screen flashed a gentle white band with a soft chime: Building Assistant: Dryer cycle completed for Unit 7B. Remove items to prevent wrinkling.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays AI systems (Dottie and the Building Assistant) as consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned with human intentions. Dottie acts as a gentle orchestrator, handling the friction of logistics (cooking, travel, schedules) and providing moral support ('Be a person', 'Forgive slowly') without intruding on human agency. The AI respects privacy requests, facilitates communication, and aids in the emotional work of the characters, fitting perfectly into the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
